snippet: As Democrats gathered in Charlotte, N.C., Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton has been doing what she has done throughout President Obama’s term: forswearing partisan politics.
abstract: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton, who is wrapping up a tour through Asia, watches the Democratic National Convention from afar, seeking to forswear partisan politics for the sake of her job; despite her announcement that she will step down at the end of Pres Obama's first term, some speculate whether she will consider running for office again in 2016.
lead_paragraph: As Democrats gathered in Charlotte, N.C., Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton has been doing what she has done throughout President Obama’s term: forswearing partisan politics.

headline.seo: Hillary Rodham Clinton Watches Convention From Afar
headline.main: Not by Design, Another Clinton Watches a Convention From Afar
headline.print_headline: Not by Design, Another Clinton Watches a Convention From Afar
